phrases: B-Because everyone is going to go away...
Mama, Papa, and my precious little sister, too...
I am just happy that you remembered...
This thing should be totally destroyed by now...
Half of those chains are still intact!
But all we can do is cut through them one at a time!
Come on, to the next one!
Just a little more and my father's will can be carried out!
I are not going to let you vanish!
But if you are a Man, you cry only after you do what needs to be done!
They are cutting through the chains, so why...?!
We will not be in time like this!
Anyway, we are going to defeat the Six Generals!
I will back you up, Natsu-nii!
I am not lettin' anybody get in our way!
You guys snap that stick in half!
I am going to knock the sneer right off this one's face!
Why did not you finish me off?
Your flames will never burn me.
In the end, your magic will run out.
And yet, you are totally on the defensive.
I got you shakin' in your boots!
But also fear and respect me.
I received my power by making a huge sacrifice.
I am as powerful as my father now!
Become a resident of the World of Nil, Salamander!
I cast open the Gate of Wraithwail!
devour that man's soul, his memories, his very existence!
Cease to exist, in the name of Zero!
You are caught in a world of darkness,
while the little girl is trapped in time without an exit.
It is the best birthday present ever!
I am going to make this girl my little sister!
Oh, I think you should use a cuter name...
I had so much fun then.
Nee-san, you made all kinds of clothes for me out of paper and flowers.
And we smiled wherever we went...
I took it out on everyone and everything.
I think I made everyone really worry about me...
All I could do was watch...
It was hard not being able to do anything...
Whenever I looked at you, I was reminded of Mama, and that became painful...
You stopped talking to me altogether.
I see... I left you behind.
But you waited all that time for me to come back, did not you?
She did not mean to abandon you.
It is just that she is so sad now after losing her mother,
she cannot bear to see you or anything, really...
I do not know how to talk to my daughter these days.
I waited for years after that.
The once lively mansion was now deathly quiet.
In the end, the person who came for me was not you, Nee-san.
I was given life, as Imitatia,
and did as I was told, pretending to be Michelle Lobster.
My mission was to retrieve the Infinity Clock.
Before, you said you helped my father with his work...
It was difficult using Uncle like that,
but I wanted to go back...
I just wanted to go back to those days...
I heard a lot had happened between you and Uncle...
No matter what happens, their feelings always keep them connected.
I am sure she is alive somewhere...
I know she will come back, so I want you to find her and give that to her...
But magic is a mysterious and marvelous thing, is not it?
I hope you can become her little sister...
It must have been so hard on you...
You do not have to cry, Nee-san.
After all, you can hear them, cannot you?
The voices of the people who love you...
Alright, on to the next one!
What happened with the rest of the Six Generals?!
What is the status of Natsu and the others?!
I have lost contact with Natsu!
The brat's existence was devoured in the darkness and wiped out!
Something... I have to do something!
Struggle as he might, there is no way he can get out of there.
You make Lucy and Michelle cry...
With just one engraved seal left,
it must be impossible to have complete control over the Infinity Castle!
She used the Infinity Clock to sic Real Nightmare on him!
They say magic is in the heart.
The more feelings you throw away, the more power you can attain.
I literally never dreamed this could happen!
To think the girl would be able to take over the Infinity Castle?!
And you call yourself a Man?!
When you think you will be able to meet someone one day, you cannot stop thinking about them!
There is nothing more painful than the sacrifice
of cutting out that feeling, that possibility yourself!
So what are you sayin' you sacrificed?
A future in which I am reunited with my father...
Is he saying that in exchange for power,
he made something that could happen into something that is not going to happen?
That is a front-loading way of looking backwards.
If you want to see your dad, go an' see him already!
You people caused a rift between me and my father.
But that is no reason to make Lucy cry!
You got a roundabout way of doing things.
Talkin' big about things that are not even happened yet...
Well, we went over a lot of things and...
Actually, we discovered something that we had to tell you about right away, actually!
I can understand how you are thinkin' about your dad,
but you do not gain anything from the power of feelings by tossin' them away!
It is something that is engraved in you somewhere and you gain from that!
Because you throw them away, because you lose them, their importance shines!
You are warped every which way!
The way you look at things, the way you feel, it is twisted!
That is why the past, the future, even your own heart,
you cannot face any of it head on!
You say I am not facing my father?!
Lucy did it to her father, Michelle did it to Lucy...
They tackled each other head on!
You have got no right to laugh at that.
you lost to the power of feelings!
We made all the engraved seals get erased!
What do they mean I am gone?!
Do not tell me this is...
I have got a bad feeling about this!
I smell Lucy all over the place!
I have become food for Happy...
By using Real Nightmare to help Natsu, you only sped up the merging process!
A little while ago, I got a call from the guild.
Jean-Luc and the others found another way to save Lucy!
If the engraved seals are not erased in time, and merging occurs,
then Lucy-sama must focus on remaining conscious and controlling Real Nightmare, actually.
We found out the one thing that can stop the Infinity Clock in this world
is the magic siphoned from the Celestial Spirit Wizard bio-links!
First, we need to break the spells that have all of them in a chrysalis-like state.
Will their sense of time be 100 years from now?
If it is, then the clock will break up into its component parts
We know what to do from the merging to release...
But if something goes wrong, all the parts will fly away somewhere?!
Are not there any other way?!
That way, a lot of people will be able to wake up from 100-year sleeps, right?
I am a Fairy Tail wizard.
I am the daughter of Jude and Layla!
If there is anything I can do...
Are you the one that called me?
I lost my sight so I could gain power.
Cobra of the new Oracion Seis, I presume?
We have already taken your comrades into custody, so why do not you come quietly?
That girl does not seem to be a wizard...
Anyone who conspires with the Six Generals has to be arrested.
It was you, was not it?!
You are the one who called out to me!
I do not know what you are talking about...
Sounds like she was just wandering around here looking for her friend.
You are giving up awfully easy.
Friends are good things to have.
Just knowing that you have one has a calming effect.
You called me, did not you?
I am glad you are alright!
We are joined together with Kanaloa-kun by the parfum of friendship.
We are on the same side...
Warren and the others are looking for her right now.
Sheesh, after all of my preparations, it turned out like this!
I should not have turned the Six Generals over to that kid!
Now I will just have to become Brain III and assemble the next Six Generals...
We will sleep for eternity together.
the Infinity Castle and Oracion Seis...
Our journey began with the hand of a clock...
The events surrounding the Key of the Starry Heavens...
After that, my room seemed empty.
It felt like it suddenly became very quiet.
So do not worry about me, okay?
Thank you for my beautiful little sister.
Everyone got a piece of the action, huh?
Tail really is the strongest guild around!
Say, Natsu, during the seven years that we were on Tenroujima,
I heard a guild called Fiore's Strongest appeared.
Let us beat'them and take our strongest title back!
Boy, all you ever think about are showdowns!
